alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 410 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hanover, or 24 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hanover, Truckton and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
